note: Copy and paste these sample videos into your Firebase Firestore manually. Replace URLs with your actual Cloudinary URLs.

sample_videos.title: Amazing Nature Documentary - Wildlife in 4K
sample_videos.description:
Explore the beauty of nature with this stunning 4K documentary. Watch as we journey through forests, mountains, and oceans to discover incredible wildlife. This video showcases the natural world in all its glory.

Chapters:
0:00 - Introduction
2:30 - Forest Wildlife
5:45 - Mountain Peaks
8:20 - Ocean Life

#nature #documentary #wildlife #4k

sample_videos.title: Flutter Tutorial for Beginners - Build Your First App
sample_videos.description:
Learn Flutter from scratch! In this comprehensive tutorial, we'll build a complete mobile app together. Perfect for beginners who want to get started with Flutter development.

What you'll learn:
✅ Flutter basics
✅ Widget structure
✅ State management
✅ Building UI
✅ Firebase integration

Code available on GitHub!

#flutter #tutorial #coding #mobile

sample_videos.title: Cooking Masterclass: Italian Pasta from Scratch
sample_videos.description:
Join me in the kitchen as we make authentic Italian pasta from scratch! Learn the traditional techniques passed down through generations.

Ingredients:
- 2 cups flour
- 3 eggs
- Pinch of salt
- Olive oil

Time stamps:
0:00 - Intro
1:20 - Making the dough
5:30 - Rolling pasta
9:15 - Cooking tips
12:40 - Final presentation

#cooking #pasta #italian #recipe

sample_videos.title: Top 10 Travel Destinations for 2025
sample_videos.description:
Planning your next vacation? Here are the top 10 must-visit destinations for 2025! From tropical beaches to historic cities, we've got you covered.

10. Bali, Indonesia
9. Iceland
8. Tokyo, Japan
7. Santorini, Greece
6. New Zealand
5. Peru
4. Norway
3. Switzerland
2. Maldives
1. Italy

Which one would you visit first? Let us know in the comments!

#travel #vacation #destinations #2025

sample_videos.title: Fitness Routine - 30 Min Full Body Workout at Home
sample_videos.description:
Get fit at home with this 30-minute full body workout! No equipment needed. Perfect for all fitness levels.

Workout breakdown:
- 5 min warmup
- 20 min main workout
- 5 min cooldown and stretching

Exercises included:
• Push-ups
• Squats
• Lunges
• Planks
• Burpees
• Mountain climbers

Remember to stay hydrated and listen to your body!

#fitness #workout #homeworkout #exercise

instructions: 2. Get the video URL from Cloudinary
3. Get the thumbnail URL (or use Cloudinary auto-generated thumbnail)
5. Go to Firebase Console > Firestore Database
6. Click on 'videos' collection (create if doesn't exist)
8. Copy the fields from above and paste values
9. IMPORTANT: Make sure duration, views, likes, dislikes, subscribers are NUMBER type
10. For timestamp, use the server timestamp (clock icon in Firebase Console)
12. Repeat for each video you want to add
